name: HQ_SP
description:
A short game developed for the HQ_Residential_House game jam. It takes place in your bedroom. Exciting!

I had initially planned to take the original store-bought map and create this game using one of its iconic rooms; however, due to financial constraints, I ended up recreating the master bedroom from scratch using custom assets. Hopefully this is acceptable within the terms of the game jam; if not, I still hope you enjoy. Please say hello to the centipede for me.
